title: "Feature: Event Calendar Interface"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Add a visual calendar interface to display activity schedules, making it easier for students to view and plan their participation in extracurricular activities.

## New Features
- Visual calendar view of all scheduled activities
- Month/week/day view options
- Color-coded activities by category
- Click-to-view activity details from calendar

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Calendar component renders correctly
- [ ] Activities display on correct dates/times
- [ ] Users can switch between month/week/day views
- [ ] Calendar is responsive on mobile and desktop
